item.title: Why am i so unlucky?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:66, topic:30636”]I still don’t understand something.

Almost every thread with someone explaining their current problems has turned into one giant flame war. Every single time everyone just yells at the thread maker calling them attention whores. The ONE time Mr.Chris says something bad, you all attack him like you’ve never flamed someone before. Like I said, hypocrites ftl.[/quote]

People flamed him because it was unnecessary. It’s not like Mr. Chris got special treatment or something.

[quote=“jme_009, post:66, topic:30636”]I still don’t understand something.

Almost every thread with someone explaining their current problems has turned into one giant flame war. Every single time everyone just yells at the thread maker calling them attention whores. The ONE time Mr.Chris says something bad, you all attack him like you’ve never flamed someone before. Like I said, hypocrites ftl.[/quote]

People flamed him because it was unnecessary. It’s not like its special treatment for Mr. Chris.

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:67, topic:30636”]There are plenty of ways to insult someone that don’t involve anything sexual. Seriously, what do you gain calling someone in terms “short penis” than say a stupid retard.

Seriously, all this flame in this forum just sucks.[/quote]
It’s a figure of speech. Of course I don’t know how large his penis is, nor do I care. Penis = Pride. That is what I was getting at. And your post really reminded me of fellioxmcsasdagea’s thread.

Read full topic

Get some Viagra, if you are self-conscious of your tiny penis. So maybe you need to grow up. People don’t need counseling if they have a bad day. You need counseling if you have such a low self-esteem you need to diss people online to feel good about yourself.[/quote]

item.title: Why am i so unlucky?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:53, topic:30636”]j4m3s - For your information:

I’m not looking for mod ship at all. If Mopar deems it neccassery to mod me, he will. I shant go out looking for it, because 99% chance I will be disappointed.

I admit, I severely broke the rules, and understand if Mopar or anyone else bans me.

I was apologizing because I upset someone who had just had a bad day. I was a prick, and shouldn’t of reacted in that way. For that, I am sorry. He accepted the apology, and that should be the end of it.

Please stop the flamming. I know I am guilty of it, but It really isn’t the best thing to do.[/quote]
If I may add, this is why Mr.Chris is heavily respected, he can come through with an appology even if he deams more flaming. ilyaostr9 I also respect you for that appoligy.
This is why Mopar is quite a good community once you get past the flamming. Alot of people can admit they broke the rules and move on, some can’t.

Read full topic

is that what you do. Have a “buttfuck” when your angry?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 03:18:01 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Scar link=topic=44797.msg553969#msg553969 date=1165025820]

wow didnt know this would turn into a thread full of flamers…

well,first off all thanks to the people that defended me.
and Mr.Chris i’ll forgive you cause everyone makes mistakes(yes,even people with 62 rep :P)

rofl, you think he posted this as a mistake, the only reason he “apoligised” is because he didnt want to get banned/lose modship chances. Your a total retard, you dont post shit on the internet looking for sympathy. Go get counselling or something, you clearly need help.
